article: Mrs Green lives in a small village . Her husband is dead , but she has one son . His name is Jack . He is twenty - one . He worked in the shop in the village and lived with his mother , but then he found a job in a faraway town named Green Sea . He went and lived there . Mrs Green was not happy about it . Last Sunday , Mrs Green was angry . She got on a train and went to her son ' s house in Green Sea . Then she said to him , " Jack , why do you never telephone me ? " Jack laughed , " But , mother , you do n ' t have a telephone . " " No , " she answered , " I have n ' t , but you have one ! "
questions: Mrs Green ' s home is in

model: a small town named green sea
